thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Eloisa
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Eloisa

author: Eloisa
title: Eloisa
text: I was stuck in such a rut. I racked up both my credit cards due to unemployment, getting a new place, Christmas gifts etc. I was paying 200 plus every month on both my cards, the amount just kept going up and up due to interest. At David Sklar and associates they helped me find an accurate plan that was suited to my needs and was realistic in price based on how much monthly income I make. I am a little less stressed, I now know that in the distant future there will be an end to my debt and I can not wait.
